item.description:
Date: Saturday, June 23, 2012

Time:12:30 pm - 6pm

Place: Arsenal Park 485 Arsenal St. Watertown, MA 02472

Cost: $15 (early bird RSVP)

                 early RSVP is by Thursday midnite 6/21/12.

         $20 (if late rsvp or walk in)

Pay at the picnic registration table. In lieu of prepayment - we ask that you please honor your RSVP. This helps us in the planning, purchases and food prep for the picnic.

If you are new to Boston or new to our meetup group this is a great event to come out and meet our members. Join us for our 4th annual picnic/bbq. This is our biggest event of the year and we hope you can make it. We have rented a 3 picnic grills and their picnic tables all in one area (look for the covered picnic area next to the water foundtain). Come and meet other meetup members and have some fun. The park also has tennis and basketball courts nearby and we will set up a badminton net on the playing field. Bring a frisbee, lawn chair and/or picnic blanket and join us for a good time. [:)]

We will be serving a delicious bbq:

Steak tips! Teriyaki chicken Wings, burgers, hot dogs, fish balls grilled, vegetable kabobs, vietnamese fresh spring rolls, potato & pasta salads, noodles, watermelon, ice cold drinks.

There is free parking at the park and the nearby mall. If you need a ride, please note that in your rsvp and someone may be able to give you a ride. You can take the bus to the park as well. If you can provide a ride, please note that. 

By MBTA Bus - The 70 and 70A buses stop on Arsenal Street, not too far from Arsenal Park. (There are other bus lines that stop a few blocks away, such as the 86 and 64.) Please visit http://mbta.com to plan your trip.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for covered picnic area near the water fountain- if you are facing the park we will be all the way to the right.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Annual Picnic/BBQ :)
